headline: UBS Downplays G7 CGM Sensor Concerns, Affirms DexCom’s Inc. (DXCM) ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) is one of the best growth stocks to buy and hold forever. On September 22, UBS reiterated a ‘Buy’ rating on the stock and a $106 price target. The research firm reiterated the bullish stance even as the company faces concerns over its G7 continuous glucose monitoring sensor. The device has come […]
